participant_abstract.sent: The initial findings of the industrial designer, user interface designer and market researcher were presented through power point presentations.

A discussion was held to bring this information together to lead to the development of a product which fits in with the company's purpose - to design fashionable electronics, in this case a fashionable television remote control.

participant_actions.sent: Further research into each field: funding.
Use of recognised designs for covers.

participant_decisions.sent: It was decided that the product should be/have: - a single function television remote control*. minimal buttons (power, channel selection and volume control found to be most important)*. no use of LCD screen, voice recognition or teletext.
Tracking device - an alarm on the remote control activated by a button which could be attached to any television set (adhesive). highly visible - incorporating self timed lit up buttons.
Highly tactile - buttons in the shape of the numbers.
